name: Silicon & Software Systems
overview: Silicon & Software Systems Ltd, a Connected Consumer Technology company, provides mixed-signal semiconductor IP solutions. Its technologies, products, and professional services that enable consumer electronics companies, semiconductor companies, service providers, and consumer healthcare providers to deliver next-generation devices, systems, and services to consumers at home and on the move. The company offers StormTest, an intelligent automated set-top box (STB) testing; coLinkTV, a software that accelerates time-to-market for STB makers; coTestTV, a test solution for OpenTV HPK driver implementations; and S3 Infermetrics, a broadcast audience measurement system that measures concurrent media consumption across TV, mobile, and the Internet. It also offers S3 Powerdown that reduces power consumption; onHandTV, a mobile TV client software solution; Engage, a Web based project communications tool; and designs ICs for set-top boxes and mobile handsets. In addition, the company offers high-performance low-power mixed-signal IPs for a range of applications, including WLAN, fixed and mobile, mobile TV, cellular communications, digital radio, satellite communications, short range communications, wire line networking, digital imaging and video, industrial, and radiation hardened IPs for space applications, as well as for software defined radio multi-standard transceivers. Further, it offers architecture, design, development consultancy, and integration services to companies that develop and implement connected health and wellness systems; and system integration services, including SI management, technology consulting, new product software system integration, legacy product upgrade, legacy product maintenance and support, and testing and certification services. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Leopardstown, Ireland. It has engineering design centers in Ireland, the Czech Republic, Poland, and Portugal, as well as in San Jose, California.
